title: Grip and stance
brief_description: Demonstrates the position of the hands on a golf club shaft and shows how finger placement on a club is importance id directing each golf shot. Diagrams the placement of the feet in relationship to the ball and discusses the probable results of shot made from different stances. Inclines demonstrations by Tommy Armour ins stop motion and slow motion photography.
